Children’s Party Planning Tips

Your child’s birthday is coming up faster than think...now what should you do to celebrate this special day of the year.  Many parents are puzzled as what to do, thinking- “I want to throw an awesome party my child will love,” “I want all my guests to have a great time,” “I don’t want to shop around to find the perfect party equipments.” To all parents out there- STOP WORRYING!! Fiesta4Kids is a one-stop shop party rental company.  We have from decorations to entertainment. 

Now let’s start planning your child’s party!
Read more

Why should I choose fiesta4kids?

  • Friendly staff
  • 15 years experience in making kids & families happy.
  • We really flexible with our customers.
  • We always are looking for new ideas.
  • We do parties for everyone from 0 to 100 years old.
  • Competitive price.
  • We help our first time costumers.
  • We are fun.
  • Read more about Why should I choose fiesta4kids?
  • Add new comment

How do I know will the equipment fit in my space?

We always recommend that the space should be discussed before booking any unit. It is a good idea to measure the space before ordering. You can ask us to help by telling the exact dimensions of the unit.

  • Read more about How do I know will the equipment fit in my space?
  • Add new comment

Can I pick up the tents?

We would recommend you to go for a delivery when it comes to Tents. They are heavy and needs to be installed properly in order to insure safety.

  • Read more about Can I pick up the tents?
  • Add new comment

What flooring is required to install a tent?

The tent can be installed on concrete and grass. It is advisable to install on grass. If the setup is on concrete we hold the tent using water barrel. The water outlet and hose is to be arranged by the client.

  • Read more about What flooring is required to install a tent?
  • Add new comment

Do we have to clean the fun food machines?

We require you to clean the machine with a wet cloth. So that it is easier for us to sanitize and do proper cleanup for the next customer. If the machines are returned messy and dirty a cleaning charge will be imposed of $25

  • Read more about Do we have to clean the fun food machines?
  • Add new comment

Is it important to be available when you are delivering?

Yes! At the time of delivery our staff gives a quick explanation on the running of the unit. They would also require the balance payment and sign on the contract.

  • Read more about Is it important to be available when you are delivering?
  • Add new comment

Are there any special requirements for partying in a Park?

Yes! You will have to make sure you have the following:
Permit from the park to set up inflatable units
Check on the power availability or get a generator
Map of the park /location for setup

  • Read more about Are there any special requirements for partying in a Park?
  • Add new comment

Sunday Pick up

Pick up Sunday 9 am -10 pm
Return Monday 10 am - 6pm

  • Read more about Sunday Pick up
  • Add new comment

Saturday Pickup

Friday Pickup (if the unit is available) 3-6pm
Saturday Pickup – 8-9am
Return Sunday 8-9am

  • Read more about Saturday Pickup

Welcome

Fiesta4kids is a one stop shop for all your party equipment rental needs. Proudly serving Toronto and the GTA since 2002

With a large assortment of colorful inflatable bouncy castles, inflatable sports games, balloon decorations, food machines, water games, entertainers, obstacles courses, carnival games, party equipment and all kinds of amusement rentals that you can imagine, we’ll make sure your party is unforgettable!!

We are thrilled to serve you with your small or large event. We have the best party supplies for school events, corporate picnics, church events, community events, street festivals, fundraising and holiday events, and of course, your little one´s special birthday party.

At Fiesta4Kids we are always looking for the latest games and the newest ideas to create great parties just for you! Give us a call today, or send us an Email and someone from our friendly team will help you in making your Event an unforgettable adventure.

Creating unique events… Impossible to forget!!!
